data.text: @SDECoxHealth Thank you. I just found that and see we’re at a yellow level. Hopefully the warm weather will help us move to green in Greene!
@abbe_ehlers Here are the cdc recommendations. One can look up their individual county. This is for Greene County. https://t.co/fFelIT0vRn
@SDECoxHealth Curious about where we are in regards to the CDC masking. I heard 71% of the country is “open”.
@SDECoxHealth What would you recommend parents of children under five do with regard to the new CDC guidance?
